https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/44IZLl6wD8aI8HXbJLqiMqEFtph.jpg Set in the early 1990s, "As You Are" is the telling and retelling of a relationship between three teenagers as it traces the course of their friendship through a construction of disparate memories prompted by a police investigation. As You Are
